original_title: Pass the Warning: Reflecting on Nic Roeg's Masterpiece
overview: New featurette, writer/director Brad Bird, writer/director Andrew Haigh, director Danny Boyle, and cinematographer Anthony B. Richmond, amongst others, discuss the Nic Roeg's diverse body of work and his visual style as well as Don't Look Now.
title: Pass the Warning: Reflecting on Nic Roeg's Masterpiece
